sentences.en: " Who said it wasn't , brat? " Madam sounded angry.
sentences.cn: 大娘很生气的说: “ 毛丫头,谁说值得?

sentences.en: At the stern, Madam and Wuduo were talking.
sentences.cn: 在后梢, 听到大娘同五多谈着柴米.

sentences.en: But they were caught as they were passing Madam Chou's flat.
sentences.cn: 但是他们刚走过周氏的窗下就被人拦住了.

sentences.en: Dear madam, I am very glad and honoured to write to you.
sentences.cn: 亲爱的女士, 我能给你写信真是感到十分荣幸.

sentences.en: Dear Madam, Thank you for your interest in our Memorial Scheme.
sentences.cn: 尊敬的女士，感谢您对我们的纪念方案的关注。

sentences.en: If you agree to this name, madam , she's sure to live to a ripe old age.
sentences.cn: 姑奶奶若依我这名字, 必然长命百岁.

sentences.en: Madam Wang and her five children quickly departed in three sedan - chairs.
sentences.cn: 于是四乘轿子带走了王氏和她的五个孩子(倩儿和带淑芳的杨奶妈也跟去了).

sentences.en: Madam wondered why the Warden was coming.
She's a little madam — don't let her order you around.
sentences.cn: 她喜欢指使别人,别让她把你搞得团团转.

sentences.en: Sue is a thoroughly precocious little madam if ever there was one.
sentences.cn: 休确实是个少见的早熟的小丫头。

sentences.en: The greedy madam stopped at nothing to gain profit.
sentences.cn: 贪婪的老鸨为了攫取利润无所不为.

sentences.en: This looked bad . Wuduo and Madam disappeared into the back cabin.
sentences.cn: 五多同大娘看情形不对, 一齐逃到后舱去了.
这边请, 女士. (接待用语,复数借用ladies)

sentences.en: Wait till I get you home, young madam.
sentences.cn: 等着我把你接回家来吧，大小姐。

sentences.en: What can I do for you, madam?

phrases.tran_cn: 尊敬的先生或女士（信笺的开头语）

trans.tran_cn: 女士，小姐，喜欢指使他人的年轻妇女，（妓院的）鸨母
trans.tran_en: used to address a woman in a polite way, especially a customer in a shop
